name: extdirect-amqp-server
description: Gateway for an ExtJs-Application (client) issueing an ExtDirect-Request to a NodeJs backend (gateway) whereas the requests are first sent to a message-broker using the amqp-protocol and from there to the NodeJs Server. The NodeJs server then returns the callback to the message-broker which then sends it back to the gateway where it is returned as an ExtDirect response to the client.
author: Regine Rosewich <regine.rosewich@appadaptive.de> (http://appadaptive.de)
